description: OPINION AND ORDER # 93763: 24 MOTION to Dismiss filed by Goldman Sachs & Co.,, Goldman Sachs Group, Inc.,, Henry M. Paulson, Jr. For the foregoing reasons, defendants' motion to dismiss as to Goldman defendants is DENIED. Defendant Paulson's motion to dismiss for section 10(b), Rule 10b-5, and section 20(a) claims is granted without prejudice. Plaintiff is given 30 days from the date of this opinion and order to seek leave to amend the complaint as to defendant Paulson. (Signed by Judge Kenneth M. Karas on 9/29/2006) (lb, ) Modified on 10/4/2006 (db, ). (Entered: 09/29/2006)
